title: [安全][监控][汉化]SeePlayerInventory v1.4 —— 查看玩家背包和末影箱[1.5.2~1.6.2]
author: liliangxu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:48 编辑 


大家好我是AL 今天给大家带来一款安全、监控插件
还记得之前防熊孩子必备的“监控插件”么？今天这款插件可以达到类似的效果 从此查水表不用翻玩家数据了 可以通过本插件查看其它玩家的背包或者末影箱 OP必备哟~预防熊孩纸
汉化截图

插件命令

/spi ? - 显示插件帮助菜单./spi open <player> - 打开指定玩家背包./spi menu - 打开所有玩家背包菜单(点击玩家头像即可打开其背包)/spi ec <player> - 打开指定玩家末影箱./spi reload - 重载插件.


插件权限
(若没有配置权限 则默认为OP才可使用)
seeplayerinventory.admin - 允许使用所有命令seeplayerinventory.use - 允许使用 /spiseeplayerinventory.use.help - 允许使用 /spi ?seeplayerinventory.use.open - 允许使用 /spi open <player>seeplayerinventory.use.menu - 允许使用  /spi menuseeplayerinventory.use.enderchest - 允许使用  /spi ecseeplayerinventory.use.reload - 允许使用  /spi reloadseeplayerinventory.checkupdates - 如果你有这个权限 你进入服务器时 服务器将检查本插件更新


下载地址
SeePlayerInventory v1.3 (1.5.2): http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=338997387&uk=67260153SeePlayerInventory v1.4 (1.6.2): http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=574872719&uk=67260153
安装方法
将本插件jar放入plugins插件文件夹中
更新日志
Version 1.4+ Add UpdateChecker.+ Add config.yml.+ Add config Version Checker.+ Add command /spi ec <player> (Open player's Enderchest).+ Add command /spi reload.+ Add Permission seeplayerinventory.use.reload.+ Add Permission seeplayerinventory.use.enderchest.+ Add Permission seeplayerinventory.checkupdates.+ Add EnderChest Menu.! Change the menu , now when your use /spi menu your get a inventory witch 2 items(1 item bring your to the menu for open players inventory and the other bring your to the menu for open player's enderchest).* Fix a litle error witch metrics.Version 1.3+ Add a inventory menu with all user online(Click on one face an you open her inventory)+ Add the command : /spi menu+ Add The permission : seeplayerinventory.use.menu+ Add The permission : seeplayerinventory.admin+ Add metricsVersion 1.2+ Compatibility witch CraftBukkit 1.5.2 R1.0* Fix Some errores

有任何问题都可在本帖提出 我会尽量解答
最后求人气~求回复~好用的话求好评~
